ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: It s true, I have the Razorclaw figure and it is just like that, actually. It s Beast Machine s Razorclaw, and his whole body except for his legs flip

OOC: It's true, I have the Razorclaw figure and it is just like that,
actually. It's Beast Machine's Razorclaw, and his whole body except for his
legs flip over and all go into place on the other side when he transforms,
resulting in his arms becoming his back legs indeed. Green is a weird color
for him, though, I hope that helped...
----- Original Message -----
From: <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 11:09 AM
Subject: Re: Trouble in the lab


> (His robot arms are his beast legs, His shoulders flip around to
> become his thighs resulting in the catapult jump he used.)
>
> Razor Claw put up an invisible shield to protect himself from her
> pecks. He remained still, waiting to see what Ice did next.
>
> Lunarpine saw the break in the action and took advantage. He
> transformed to his half wolf stage and dashed into the battle.
> Foxfingers rolled out and began scampering toward Lunarpine.
> Lunarpine grabbed the fox and pulled him to safety.
>
> Veratis watched as the stalemate continued. The virus seemed to have
> given Razor Claw extra abilities too. He catalogued each movement and
> each technique. Both were changed thanks to him, and both were deadly.
>
>  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > (Actually, I can't remember how he transforms, but I'll take your
> > work on it.)
> > Ice::
> > She transformed into owl mode and flew up, and behind Razor Claw.
> > She pecked on his back. "Leave the fox alone. It's you and me now."
> > She squawked and flew over to the other end of the room so Fox
> > FIngers could get out of there.
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > Razor Claw Transformed to raptor mode catapulting him over Ice's
> > > head. (If you know how Dinobot transforms you'll understand how
> > that
> > > maneuver would work.) He spun around lashing his tail at the
> polar
> > > bear. his head flashed past Foxfingers hiding place snapping his
> > > teeth in a taunting manner.
> > >
> > > Foxfingers ducked his head all the way under the science station
> > > where he hid. "Please don't eat me?" he pleaded in complete
> horror
> > as
> > > the teeth snapped.
> > >
> > > Lunarpine stepped a little closer ready to intervene at any
> moment.
> > >
> > > Veratis called to Foxfingers trying to get him away from
> > > danger. "You're a thief, remember, you can get out of any dead
> > end."
> > > If Foxfingers stayed in shock someone would have to go get him.
> > >
>
>
>
>
>
